def getPermutationsStringList(numString):
    permuMapList = list(map(lambda p: "".join(p), itertools.permutations(numString)))
    
    return permuMapList


def getPermutationsNumberList(numString):
    permuMapList = getPermutationsStringList(numString)
    permuMapList = [int(item) for item in permuMapList]
    
    return permuMapList
